issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: The problem is a duplicate of an existing issue.
resolution.name: Duplicate

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
after changing  to : 
*  ios 10,
*  Xcode 8, 
*  titanium sdk :  5.3.1 -> 5.5.0, 


*console no longer show info*. after build stuck on : Please manually launch the application
 note : it still show info with simulator.
*facebook login no longer work* on iphone ios10 , blank screen on login, or quit app with a CFBundleURLSchemes key  like fb1234567890123456foo
fields.summary: on sdk 5.5.0GA , facebook & console no longer work
